alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Grant; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN KENTON, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, SOUTHERN BOONE, NORTHEASTERN GRANT, NORTHERN PENDLETON, SOUTHERN CLERMONT, CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND SOUTH CENTRAL HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sardinia to near Walton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Walton, Claryville, Crittenden, Mount Orab, Bethel, Winchester, Sardinia, Felicity, Butler, Emerald, Hamersville, Mentor, Moscow, Neville, California, Atwood, Grants Lick, Saltair and Northcutt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
